panels.title: Overview (updates based on top time selection)

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') as time
    , sum(case when action = 'ACCEPT' then requests else 0 END) as accept_requests
    , sum(case when action = 'REJECT' then requests else 0 END) as reject_requests
    , sum(case when action = 'ACCEPT' then bytes else 0 END) as accept_bytes
    , sum(case when action = 'REJECT' then bytes else 0 END) as reject_bytes
    , sum(case when action = 'ACCEPT' then packets else 0 END) as accept_packets
    , sum(case when action = 'REJECT' then packets else 0 END) as reject_packets
    , sum(bytes) as bytes
    , sum(packets) as packets
    , sum(requests) as requests
FROM "$__table"
WHERE "account_id" IN (${account_id:sqlstring}) 
    AND "region" IN (${region:sqlstring}) 
    AND "vpc-id" IN (${vpc_id:sqlstring}) 
    AND "action" IN (${action:sqlstring}) 
    AND "flow-direction" IN (${flow_direction:sqlstring})
    AND "type" IN (${type:sqlstring})
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}')
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT "vpc-id", "subnet-id", "flow-direction", "traffic-path", "type", "protocol", "pkt-src-aws-service", "pkt-dst-aws-service", sum(packets) as packets, sum(bytes) as bytes, sum(requests) as requests
FROM "$__table"
WHERE "account_id" IN (${account_id:sqlstring}) 
    AND "region" IN (${region:sqlstring}) 
    AND "vpc-id" IN (${vpc_id:sqlstring}) 
    AND "action" IN (${action:sqlstring}) 
    AND "flow-direction" IN (${flow_direction:sqlstring})
    AND "type" IN (${type:sqlstring})
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY "vpc-id", "subnet-id", "flow-direction", "traffic-path", "type", "protocol", "pkt-src-aws-service", "pkt-dst-aws-service"

SELECT 
    "flow-direction",
    "srcaddr", 
    "dstaddr", 
    sum(packets) as packets, 
    sum(bytes) as bytes, 
    count(1) as requests,
    sum(sum(bytes)) over() as all_bytes
FROM "$__table"
WHERE "account_id" IN (${account_id:sqlstring}) 
    AND "region" IN (${region:sqlstring}) 
    AND "vpc-id" IN (${vpc_id:sqlstring}) 
    AND "action" IN (${action:sqlstring}) 
    AND "flow-direction" IN (${flow_direction:sqlstring})
    AND "flow-direction" != '-'
    AND "type" IN (${type:sqlstring})
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY "flow-direction", "srcaddr", "dstaddr"

panels.description: The data is calculated based on the UTC time zone, not the browser's time zone. If your current time zone differs from UTC, you need to perform a time zone conversion.

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT 
  hour(timestamp) as hour,
	day_of_week(timestamp) as day_of_week,
	sum(packets) as packets, 
	sum(bytes) as bytes, 
	count(1) as requests,
	sum(sum(bytes)) over() as all_bytes
FROM "$__table"
WHERE "account_id" IN (${account_id:sqlstring}) 
	AND "region" IN (${region:sqlstring}) 
	AND "vpc-id" IN (${vpc_id:sqlstring}) 
	AND "action" IN (${action:sqlstring}) 
	AND "flow-direction" IN (${flow_direction:sqlstring})
	AND "flow-direction" != '-'
	AND "type" IN (${type:sqlstring})
	AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
  AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY hour(timestamp), day_of_week(timestamp)
ORDER BY day_of_week(timestamp) asc, hour(timestamp) asc

panels.title: * Heat Map

panels.description: The path that egress traffic takes to the destination. To determine whether the traffic is egress traffic, check the flow-direction field. The possible values are as follows. If none of the values apply, the field is set to -.
panels.title: Egress Traffic Path

renameByName.1: Through another resource in the same VPC, including resources that create a network interface in the VPC
renameByName.2: Through an internet gateway or a gateway VPC endpoint
renameByName.4: Through an intra-region VPC peering connection
renameByName.5: Through an inter-region VPC peering connection
renameByName.7: Through a gateway VPC endpoint (Nitro-based instances only)
renameByName.8: Through an internet gateway (Nitro-based instances only)

query.rawSQL:

FROM "$__table"
WHERE  event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00')
GROUP BY "account_id"

FROM "$__table"
